viewDescriptions.name: @NEWS_VIEW_NAME_SIMPLE@
viewDescriptions.description: Shows news items in a vertical list.

viewDescriptions.name: @NEWS_VIEW_NAME_IMAGE@

viewDescriptions.name: @NEWS_VIEW_NAME_DATE@

Items.title: I'm a news headline. Use me to give your news story a title.

content.text: I'm a news story. Click here to open up the News Editor and change my text. I'm a great place for you to let your users know what's new with your company.

Items.title: I'm a news headline. Use me to give your news story a title. Click here to open up the News Editor and change my text.

content.text:
I'm a news story. Click here to open up the News Editor and change my text. Simply click me, Edit News and start editing your news. I'm a great place for you to let your users know what's new with your company. You can use this area to write your own news or include articles where you've been mentioned in the press.
In your News Editor you can store all your news and choose which stories are displayed and which you'd prefer to keep hidden. You can click on any of the Sections, Headlines and Stories already in the News Editor and replace with your own content. Clicking Add lets you create news headlines and stories which you can attach to any News Section. To add your own News Section, click Add Section. And when you're done, click Save and your work will be saved in your News editor. You can choose what news stories appear on your page. You can even choose to only display stories by the News Section or News Headline.

Items.title: I'm a news headline. Use me to give your news story a title.

content.text: I'm a news story. Click here to open up the News Editor and change my text. I'm a great place for you to let your users know what's new with your company.

content.text:
I'm a news story. Click here to open up the News Editor and change my text. Simply click me, Edit News and start editing your news. I'm a great place for you to let your users know what's new with your company. You can use this area to write your own news or include articles where you've been mentioned in the press.

In your News Editor you can store all your news and choose which stories are displayed and which you'd prefer to keep hidden. You can click on any of the Sections, Headlines and Stories already in the News Editor and replace with your own content. Clicking Add lets you create news headlines and stories which you can attach to any News Section. To add your own News Section, click Add Section. And when you're done, click Save and your work will be saved in your News editor. You can choose what news stories appear on your page. You can even choose to only display stories by the News Section or News Headline.
I'm a news story. Click here to open up the News Editor and change my text.

de.NEWS_APP_parts_Description: Erstellen Sie eine Liste Ihrer aktuellsten News. Whlen Sie ein Layout und passen Sie Ihre Newsliste an. Sie knnen alle News-Artikel in der Vorschau ansehen und diese individuell anpassen, indem Sie auf Ausdehnen anpassen klicken. Um einen neuen Bereich oder Artikel hinzuzufgen, klicken Sie auf News bearbeiten.
de.NEWS_APP_Customize_Expand_Description: Klicken Sie auf irgendetwas im Ausdehnungsmodus um dessen Stil zu ndern und benutzen Sie die Einstellungen unten um den Abstand einzustellen.
de.Customize_Expand_itemNavigationLabel: Whlen Sie den neuen Artikel, den Sie bearbeiten mchten.
de.News_anotherCategoryLabel: Nein danke, ich mchte einen neuen News-Bereich erstellen
de.News_editing_inlineHelp: Whlen Sie, welcher News-Bereich angezeigt werden soll und klicken Sie auf OK.
de.News_newItemErrorTitle: Fehler beim Erstellen eines neuen News-Bereichs
de.News_newItemErrorDescription: Bitte versuchen Sie es in wenigen Minuten erneut
de.News_Item_list_validationMessages: Titel muss mehr als 2 Zeichen  beinhalten
de.News_Item_list_noChildrenMessage: Sie haben noch keine News. Klicken Sie auf "Hinzufgen" um damit zu beginnen, Ihre News-Bereiche hinzuzufgen.
de.News_Item_validationMessages: Der Titel muss mehr als 2 Zeichen beinhalten
de.News_Item_content_validationMessages: Der Inhalt muss mehr als 2 Zeichen beinhalten
de.EditorForm_News_Title_Placeholder: Ich bin der Titel eines News-Bereichs
de.EditorForm_News_Item_Title_Placeholder: Ich bin der Titel eines News-Artikels
de.ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND_DESCRIPTION: Klicken Sie und whlen "Neuen Bereich auswhlen" um einen gltigen News-Bereich auszuwhlen
de.ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND_DISCLAIMER: Diese Nachricht wird nicht auf Ihrer publizierten Site angezeigt

en.NEWS_APP_parts_Description: Create a list of your latest news. Choose a layout and customize your news list. You can preview the full news item and personalize it by clicking Customize Expand. To add a news section or item, click Edit News.
en.NEWS_APP_Customize_Expand_Description: Click anything in the expand view to change its style and use the settings below to adjust the spacing.
en.Customize_Expand_itemNavigationLabel: Choose the news item you want to edit.
en.News_anotherCategoryLabel: No thanks, I'd like to create a new news section
en.News_editing_inlineHelp: Pick which news section you'd like to appear and click OK.
en.News_newItemErrorDescription: Please try again in a few minutes
en.News_Item_list_validationMessages: Title needs to be longer than 2 characters
en.News_Item_list_noChildrenMessage:
You have no news yet. 
 Click "Add" to start adding 
 items to your news section.
en.News_Item_validationMessages: Title needs to be longer than 2 characters
en.News_Item_content_validationMessages: Content needs to be longer than 2 characters
en.EditorForm_News_Item_Source_Description: Give credit to the creator or author.
en.ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND_DESCRIPTION: Click and select "Choose News Section" to select a valid News Section
en.ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND_DISCLAIMER: This message will not be shown on your published site

es.NEWS_APP_parts_Description: Crea una lista de tus ltimas noticias. Elige un diseo y personaliza tu lista de noticias. Puedes ver la noticia completa y personalizarla haciendo clic en Personalizar Expandir. Para agregar una seccin de noticias o un artculo, haz clic en Editar Noticia.

fr.NEWS_APP_parts_Description: Crez une liste de vos dernires news. Choisissez une mise en page et personnalisez votre news list. Vous pouvez voir un aperu de l'lment news dans son ensemble et le personnaliser en cliquant sur Personnaliser Agrandissement. Pour ajouter une section news ou un lment, cliquez sur Modifier News.
fr.NEWS_APP_Customize_Expand_Description: Cliquez sur un lment en mode agrandissement pour changer son style et utilisez les paramtres ci-dessous pour ajuster l'espacement.
fr.Customize_Expand_itemNavigationLabel: Slectionnez  l'lment news que vous souhaitez modifier.
fr.News_anotherCategoryLabel: Non merci, j'aimerais crer une nouvelle Section News
fr.News_editing_inlineHelp: Choisissez la section news que vous souhaitez voir apparatre et cliquez sur OK.

fr.News_Item_list_noChildrenMessage: Vous n'avez pas encore de news. Cliquez sur "Ajouter" pour commencer  ajouter des lments dans votre section news.

fr.News_Item_content_validationMessages: Le contenu doit comport plus de 2 caractres

it.NEWS_APP_parts_Description: Crea una lista delle tue ultime news. Scegli un layout e personalizza la tua news list. Puoi vedere in anteprima l'intero elemento news e personalizzarlo cliccando su Personalizza Espandi. Per aggiungere una sezione o un elemento news, clicca su Modifica News.
it.NEWS_APP_Customize_Expand_Description: Clicca su un qualsiasi elemento nella visualizzazione estesa per cambiare il suo stile e usa le impostazioni sotto per aggiustare la spaziatura

Clicca "Aggiungi" per iniziare ad aggiungere elementi alla tua sezione news.

pl.NEWS_APP_parts_Description: Kliknij na list ostatnich artykuw. Wybierz ukad i dostosuj list artykuw. Moesz uzyska podgld penego artykuu i go spersonalizowa, klikajc Dostosuj Tryb Rozszerzenia. Aby doda sekcj artykuw lub artyku, kliknij Edytuj Artyku.

pt.NEWS_APP_parts_Description: Crie uma lista com as suas notcias mais recentes. Escolha um layout e personalize a sua lista de notcias. Voc pode pr-visualizar todas as suas notcias e personaliz-las clicando em Personalizar Expanso. Para adicionar uma seo de notcias ou um artigo, clique em Editar Notcias.
